Posts.Content: My mom ( 77) was diagnosed with metaplastic carcinoma in Jan 06. She has received chemo and Taxol and is beginning 6 weeks of radiation. I recently received mammogram results for myself requesting further testing and a sonogram. I am a little worried..IS Metaplastic Carcinoma hereditary since my mom was diagnosed after menopause?
Posts.Title: Metaplastic Carcinoma and Heredity
